data.title: Carl Weathers
data.text:
Carl Weathers gets golf tournament named in his honor

Carl Weathers, who played “Chubbs” Peterson in Happy Gilmore, will have an annual golf tournament named after him.

Happy Gilmore 2 is indeed in the works, with Adam Sandler pal Drew Barrymore getting confirmation from the man himself.

Carl Weathers: 5 Great Roles (Outside of Rocky)

Carl Weathers was iconic as Apollo Creed in the Rocky movies, but he was great in a lot of other roles too. Here are some of his best.

Sylvester Stallone, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Adam Sandler & more pay tribute to the late Carl Weathers

Sylvester Stallone, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Adam Sandler, and more pay tribute to Carl Weathers after his unexpected death.

Carl Weathers Dies: The iconic Rocky, Predator, and Action Jackson actor was 76

Carl Weathers, the beloved actor whose work includes iconic roles in the Rocky films Predator, Happy Gilmore, and more, has passed away at 76.

Carl Weathers and Jesse Ventura have Predator reunion

Carl Weathers and Jesse Ventura had a Predator reunion, as Al Dillon and Blain Cooper met up at a convention over the weekend.
